definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: In the hexagonal close packed structure, slip systems are more limited .
sentences.chinese: 在六方密排晶格中，滑移系受到較多的限制。

sentences.english: So the lattice has a bunch of vibrational energies.
sentences.chinese: 晶格有大量的振動能級。

sentences.english: The lattice of every snowflake is six-sided in shape.
sentences.chinese: 每一片雪花的晶格都是六邊形的。

sentences.english: The more the energy of crystal lattice is, the more prior crystal crystallized from the gel-glass is.
sentences.chinese: 在凝膠玻璃的析晶過程中，晶格能大者優先析晶。

sentences.english: Theoretical studies for the energy spectra of double-layer ferrimagnetic superlattice were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對雙層亞鐵磁超晶格的能譜進行理論研究。

sentences.english: The lattice is a bunch of masses and springs.
sentences.chinese: 晶格可以看成是一堆有質量的彈簧。

sentences.english: If you have a crystal lattice with N atoms in it.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有其中有N個原子的晶格點陣。

sentences.english: The heat however requires molecules and grid work to flow down in association with each cell of the form.
sentences.chinese: 然而熱量需要分子和晶格層流向身體的每一個細胞。

sentences.english: An infrared laser system traps the atoms, locking them into pancake-shaped wells.
sentences.chinese: 紅外線激光俘獲原子，將它們陷在晶格阱中。

sentences.english: Let us invite our soul from within the etheric body to energize the etheric grid work.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們邀請我們的靈魂從以太體內給以太晶格層充能。

sentences.english: The resonant tunneling of three-tile quasiperiodic superlattices has been investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了三元準週期超晶格的電子共振隧穿性質。

sentences.english: And if we know the lattice vibrational frequency.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們再知道晶格振動頻率。

sentences.english: The creep deformation is controlled by dislocation climb resulting from lattice self-diffusion.
sentences.chinese: 該合金的蠕變由晶格自擴散引起的位錯攀移所控制。

sentences.english: At some appropriate condition, these magnetic columns are able to form two-dimension lattices .
sentences.chinese: 在適當的條件之下這些磁柱會形成二維晶格結構。

sentences.english: The electron orbits a phosphorus atom embedded in the silicon lattice, shown in silver.
sentences.chinese: 電子繞圖中銀色的硅晶格中的磷原子的軌道。

sentences.english: The first and second order satellite peaks around the main reflection appear in the superlattice rocking curve.
sentences.chinese: 除超晶格的主衍射峯外，還觀察到一級和二級衛星峯。
